participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: Creative and nurturing, Emma enjoys creating new things in the kitchen and cherishes her family time. She's open-minded and eager to explore new cultures.
participant_1.background: I took up brewing my own beer and became a regular at local car shows with my Ford F-150. My family is very supportive and understands my condition. Magic Mike is my favorite movie. I want to learn Swedish so I can be more comfortable in Sweden. Pink is my favorite color.

participant_2.name: David
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and friendly, David enjoys helping others and has a playful side, especially when it comes to his love for retro video games.
participant_2.background: My family and I are close, but we live in different states. I'm a dentist because I love helping people, but my heart belongs to my parents and sweets. My mom lives with me. My Nintendo 64 is probably my most valued possession because it was my first console and it has a lot of sentimental value to me. My favorite meal is chicken and rice.

content.text: Hey! Whats your favorite movie?
My favorite movie is Magic Mike, what's yours?
Magic Mike?! Is that the one with Channing Tatum? What do you like about it?
Yeah that's the one! I like the plot, the acting, the dancing, the music, and the overall feel of the movie.
I've never seen it, I'll have to check it out sometime. My favorite movie is The Breakfast Club. I just really relate to the characters and the story.
I've heard of that movie, but I've never seen it either. I'll have to check it out too.
What do you do for work?
I'm a dentist. I love helping people and I love working with my hands.
That's awesome! I'm a stay at home mom right now, but I used to be a nurse.
That's great! I'm sure you're a great mom.
Thanks! I try my best.
Where do you live?
I live in Sweden.
Oh cool! I've always wanted to go to Sweden.
You should come visit sometime!
I definitely will!
Great!
So, what else do you like to do for fun?
I like to bake, read, and spend time with my family.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I like to play video games, watch movies, and go to the gym.
Nice! I used to play video games a lot, but I don't have as much time for it anymore.
Yeah, I know what you mean. I have to make time for it, but it's worth it.
I agree!
So, what are your plans for the weekend?
I'm not sure yet. I might go shopping or see a movie.
That sounds like fun! I'm going to the gym and then hanging out with my friends.
Sounds like a good plan
